description: This file demonstrates how to use the agentops library to log model calls, initialize an agent with an OpenAI chat model, run a sample prompt, and print the response content.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an agent that can run prompts using a specified model.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: Represents an OpenAI chat model with a specific ID.

methods.name: agentops.init
methods.description: Initializes the agentops library for logging and monitoring.

methods.name: Agent.run
methods.description: Executes a prompt using the agent's model and returns the response.
